data.comment: The match has started at Mapfre Stadium.
Free kick Columbus.
In the minute 1, Columbus drives forward and Gyasi Zardes gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Columbus in their own half.
Alex Chilowicz awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 3, Columbus to take a throw-in in New York territory.
Alex Chilowicz awards Columbus a goal kick.
In Columbus a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 6, Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to New York.
Throw-in for New York in the half of Columbus.
Ball safe as Columbus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 8, Ball goes out of play for a New York goal kick.
Corner awarded to Columbus.
New York have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
In the minute 13, Alex Chilowicz signals a Columbus throw-in in New York's half.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to New York in their own half.
Free kick for Columbus in the half of New York.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Columbus at Mapfre Stadium.
Throw-in Columbus.
Columbus's Lucas Zelarrayan attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 16, It's a goal kick for the away team in Columbus.
Free kick for Columbus in the half of New York.
Gyasi Zardes of Columbus gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to Columbus.
Jonathan Mensah (Columbus) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by New York defenders.
Columbus have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
In the minute 18, Free kick Columbus.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Columbus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 22, Can New York get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Columbus's half?
Daniel Royer for the away team is judged to be offside.
Caden Clark scores to make it 0-1 at Mapfre Stadium.
In the minute 25, Columbus have been given a penalty...
Goal! The home team is awarded a penalty in Columbus. Pedro Santos converts to level the scoring at 1-1.
In Columbus New York attack through Daniel Royer. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 28, Columbus have a goal kick.
Columbus's Darlington Nagbe is whistled for offside at Mapfre Stadium.
Ball safe as Columbus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 31, Alex Chilowicz signals a New York throw-in in Columbus's half.
New York are in shooting range from this free kick.
In Columbus New York drive forward through Daniel Royer. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 33, Lucas Zelarrayan for Columbus is whistled offside.
Free kick for New York in their own half.
Goal kick for Columbus at Mapfre Stadium.
In the minute 34, Alex Chilowicz awards the away team a throw-in.
Can New York get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Columbus's half?
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to New York.
In the minute 37, Ball goes out of play for a New York goal kick.
In Columbus a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for New York in the half of Columbus.
In the minute 39, Columbus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sean Davis (New York) has received a yellow card from Alex Chilowicz.
Columbus have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
In the minute 42, Goal kick for New York at Mapfre Stadium.
Throw-in for New York at Mapfre Stadium.
Throw-in for New York in their own half.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in Columbus.
Alex Chilowicz blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Lucas Zelarrayan (Columbus) gets in a great strike â€“ straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
Goal! Columbus have got their heads in front thanks to a Darlington Nagbe strike.
In the minute 47, Alex Chilowicz awards the home team a throw-in.
Columbus's Derrick Etienne breaks free at Mapfre Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Alex Chilowicz awards New York a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Ball safe as New York is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Columbus have a goal kick.
Columbus are pushing forward but Derrick Etienne's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 51, It's a goal kick for the away team in Columbus.
New York make their first substitution with Cristian Casseres Jr replacing Dru Yearwood.
Columbus awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Columbus in the half of New York.
Throw-in for New York in their own half.
Columbus have a goal kick.
In the minute 54, Ball goes out of play for a New York goal kick.
Columbus to take a throw-in in New York territory.
Throw-in for Columbus at Mapfre Stadium.
In the minute 57, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Columbus close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Columbus.
Lucas Zelarrayan for Columbus gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 60, Alex Chilowicz awards New York a goal kick.
Gerhard Struber is making the team's second substitution at Mapfre Stadium with Brian White replacing Daniel Royer.
Free kick New York.
In the minute 61, Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to New York.
Goal kick for Columbus at Mapfre Stadium.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Columbus.
In the minute 63, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Columbus in Columbus.
In Columbus a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 65, Alex Chilowicz waits before resuming play because Darlington Nagbe for Columbus is still down.
Gyasi Zardes scores with a header and the home team increase their lead to 3-1.
Derrick Etienne instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 69, Darlington Nagbe is back on the pitch.
Can Columbus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Columbus.
In the minute 72, Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Columbus in their own half.
Free kick for Columbus in their own half.
Columbus pushes forward through Artur, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 76, New York will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Columbus.
Gerhard Struber (New York) is making a third substitution, with Kaku replacing Florian Valot.
The away team replace Caden Clark with Jared Stroud.
In the minute 77, New York awarded a throw-in in their own half.
New York to take a throw-in in Columbus territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 79, New York have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
Corner awarded to New York.
Throw-in for New York in the half of Columbus.
Free kick Columbus.
In the minute 80, The away team have replaced Sean Davis with Marc Rzatkowski. This is the fifth substitution made today by Gerhard Struber.
Kyle Duncan (New York) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 81, Luis Diaz is replacing Derrick Etienne for Columbus at Mapfre Stadium.
New York have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to New York.
In the minute 87, Columbus awarded a free kick in their own half.
New York have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
In the minute 89, Free kick in a good position for Columbus!
Aaron Long for New York has been booked by Alex Chilowicz and receives a first yellow card.
Ball goes out of play for a New York goal kick.
Can Columbus capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Marc Rzatkowski of New York smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
New York's Jason Pendant is back in action after a slight knock.
Goal kick for Columbus at Mapfre Stadium.
New York have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
Columbus's Luis Diaz gets in a shot on goal at Mapfre Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Alex Chilowicz awards Columbus a goal kick.
Free kick for New York in their own half.
New York's Tom Barlow misses with an attempt on goal.
Columbus have a goal kick.
It's 3-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
Goal! Brian White pulls one back to make it 3-2.
That's a fine assist from Jared Stroud.
The match at Mapfre Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Jason Pendant, who is down injured.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Columbus to check on Harrison Afful, who is grimacing with pain.
